
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiao987334176/p/18991935" title="发布于 2025-07-18 19:11">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">MoneyPrinterTurbo – 免费开源的AI短视频生成工具</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h1>一、MoneyPrinterTurbo简介</h1>
<div>
<div>
<p>MoneyPrinterTurbo是一款由开发者harry0703基于原有MoneyPrinter项目优化而来的开源AI视频生成工具。</p>
<p>这款工具的核心价值在于其全自动化的工作流程——用户只需提供一个视频主题或关键词，MoneyPrinterTurbo就能自动完成以下所有工作：</p>
<ul>
<li>根据主题生成视频文案</li>
<li>从无版权素材库中搜索匹配的视频片段</li>
<li>生成与文案同步的语音解说</li>
<li>添加可自定义的字幕</li>
<li>匹配合适的背景音乐</li>
<li>最终合成一个完整的高清短视频</li>
</ul>
<p>与OpenAI的Sora等纯AI生成视频不同，MoneyPrinterTurbo采用的是"智能缝合"技术，它将互联网上的高质量素材进行智能组合和编辑，既保证了视频质量，又避免了版权问题。这种技术路线使其对硬件要求相对较低，普通个人电脑即可运行，大大提高了实用性。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">功能特性详解</h2>
<p>MoneyPrinterTurbo集成了多种先进功能，使其成为一款真正意义上的"一站式"视频制作解决方案：</p>
<ol>
<li>多尺寸视频生成</li>
</ol>
<p>支持两种主流视频尺寸格式：</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>竖屏9:16</strong>(1080×1920)：专为抖音、快手等短视频平台优化</li>
<li><strong>横屏16:9</strong>(1920×1080)：适合YouTube、B站等平台</li>
</ul>
<ol start="2">
<li>智能文案生成</li>
</ol>
<p>内置AI文案生成引擎，支持：</p>
<ul>
<li>根据关键词自动生成视频脚本</li>
<li>支持中英文双语生成</li>
<li>允许用户自定义文案</li>
<li>可接入多种大模型(OpenAI、Ollama、Azure、通义千问等)提升文案质量</li>
</ul>
<ol start="3">
<li>多媒体元素集成</li>
</ol>
<ul>
<li><strong>语音合成</strong>：提供400多种声音选择，支持多种语言和方言</li>
<li><strong>字幕系统</strong>：可调整字体、位置、颜色、大小，支持字幕描边设置</li>
<li><strong>背景音乐</strong>：内置无版权音乐库，可随机或指定音乐，调节音量</li>
</ul>
<ol start="4">
<li>批量生成与效率工具</li>
</ol>
<ul>
<li>支持一次生成多个视频版本，便于选择最佳作品</li>
<li>可设置视频片段时长，控制素材切换频率</li>
<li>采用高清无版权素材，避免法律风险</li>
</ul>
<ol start="5">
<li>技术架构</li>
</ol>
<ul>
<li>完整的MVC架构，代码结构清晰，易于二次开发</li>
<li>同时支持API和Web界面两种调用方式</li>
<li>基于Python和MoviePy视频编辑库构建</li>
</ul>
</div>
<h2 id="h_1909912021387944819_2" data-into-catalog-status="">配置要求</h2>
<ul>
<li data-pid="Oe1zmBaM">建议最低 CPU 4核 或以上，内存 4G 或以上，<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>显卡非必须</strong></span></li>
<li data-pid="eEq8aCkR">Windows 10 或 MacOS 11.0 以上系统</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="h_1909912021387944819_3" data-into-catalog-status="">适用场景</h2>
<ul>
<li data-pid="gOkMDmOr">社交媒体运营：快速生成抖音，快手 平台短视频内容</li>
<li data-pid="Elpnc6Hg">营销推广：创建产品介绍，品牌宣传等短视频广告</li>
<li data-pid="j7DXZIV4">个人创作：个人快速制作Vlog，故事讲述等</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>先来看一下，我生成的视频效果，有声音，字幕，画面1920×1080。视频文件太大了，这里用gif演示其中5秒效果，只能上传10M的文件，视频总共有33秒。</p>
<p>&nbsp;<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202507/1341090-20250718191105596-600157322.gif" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>整体效果还是可以的，字幕，声音都有。</p>
<h1>二、安装</h1>
<h2>基础环境</h2>
<div>1.安装python&nbsp;3.13.3</div>
<div>2. 准备通义千问的API Key，Pixabay API Key</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>通义千问的API Key，用个人的即可，有免费额度。</div>
<div>Pixabay API Key，个人使用，也是免费的。链接地址：<a href="https://pixabay.com/api/docs/#api_search_videos" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://pixabay.com/api/docs/#api_search_videos</a></div>
<div>直接登录google账号，访问这个链接，就可以看到个人的API Key</div>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202507/1341090-20250718182225927-1194979036.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;3. <span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>这里强调一下，不需要显卡，只需要cpu 核和内存4G即可使用</strong></span></p>
</div>
<h2>下载资源</h2>
<div>下载一键启动包，解压直接使用（路径不要有 中文、特殊字符、空格）</div>
<div>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>https:<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">pan.baidu.com/s/1wg0UaIyXpO3SqIpaq790SQ?pwd=sbqx</span>
https:<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">drive.google.com/file/d/1HsbzfT7XunkrCrHw5ncUjFX8XX4zAuUh/view?usp=sharing</span></pre>
</div>
<p>用百度盘下载太慢了，直接用google的链接，前提是你有魔法网络，下载就很快了。</p>
</div>
<h2>启动脚本</h2>
<div>解压文件，直接双击start.bat</div>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202507/1341090-20250718182742725-2079876555.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;脚本会自动打开网页：http://localhost:8501/</p>
<h2>基础设置</h2>
<p>点击基础设置</p>
<p>大模型供应商：Qwen</p>
<p>API KEY： 输入自己的</p>
<p>模型：选择qwen-plus，也可以选择其他的，只要是文字聊天模型即可。注意：这里千万不要输入多模态的模型，比如：文生视频，图片识别等等。</p>
<p>视频来源：输入Pixabay API Key即可，国内网络可以正常使用。</p>
<p><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>注意：不要用Pexels API Key，这个必须要用魔法网络才可以使用。</strong></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202507/1341090-20250718183816181-1777975062.png" alt="" width="1938" height="988" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
</div>
<h2>&nbsp;文案设置</h2>
<p>视频主题：人间烟火，你可以输入别的主题。</p>
<p>视频文案：这里直接AI生成，你可以手动输入。最好还是AI生成，自然一点。</p>
<p>视频关键词：这里直接AI生成，只支持英文</p>
<p>视频来源：选择Pixbay，最好选这个，国内网络可以使用。</p>
<p>启用字幕：默认启用，默认字体即可。</p>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202507/1341090-20250718184253994-1091666241.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>朗读声音，这里用默认的女性即可。这里有国内方言，还有国外语言。</p>
<p>最后点击生成</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202507/1341090-20250718184654327-1896425838.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>输出如下：</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_6ae625fc-55a0-4424-b200-7cbde7133182" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_6ae625fc-55a0-4424-b200-7cbde7133182" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">
<div id="cnblogs_code_open_6ae625fc-55a0-4424-b200-7cbde7133182" class="cnblogs_code_hide">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2025</span>-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">07</span>-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">18</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">17</span>:<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">43</span>:<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">27.492</span> | INFO     | __main__:&lt;module&gt;:<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">948</span> -<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> 开始生成视频

    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">voice_name</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">zh-CN-XiaoxiaoNeural-Female</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">voice_volume</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1.0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">voice_rate</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1.0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">bgm_type</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">random</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">bgm_file</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">""</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">bgm_volume</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0.2</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">subtitle_enabled</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">subtitle_position</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">bottom</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">custom_position</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">70.0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">font_name</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">MicrosoftYaHeiBold.ttc</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text_fore_color</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">#FFFFFF</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text_background_color</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">font_size</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">60</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">stroke_color</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">#000000</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">stroke_width</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1.5</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">n_threads</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">paragraph_number</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
}

</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2025</span>-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">07</span>-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">18</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">17</span>:<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">43</span>:<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">27.497</span> | INFO     | app.services.task:start:<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">211</span> - start task: b4233916-d32f-43ff-84fb-<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3f1df5f60091, stop_at: video

</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2025</span>-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">07</span>-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">18</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">17</span>:<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">43</span>:<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">27.501</span> | INFO     | app.services.task:generate_script:<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">17</span> -<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> 

## generating video script

</div>
<span class="cnblogs_code_collapse">View Code</span></div>
<p>过程比较漫长，大概30分钟左右。</p>
<p>生成完成之后，会自动打开生成好的目录，比如：C:\Users\xiao\Downloads\MoneyPrinterTurbo-Portable-Windows-1.2.6\MoneyPrinterTurbo\storage\tasks\b4233916-d32f-43ff-84fb-3f1df5f60091</p>
<p>点击文件final-1.mp4播放</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202507/1341090-20250718184922055-665225074.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>注意：这个视频文件，是最终效果，合成了字幕，声音等文件。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>播放视频，全屏都可以。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202507/1341090-20250718190421404-428170658.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>查看视频文件分辨率，确实是1920×1080</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202507/1341090-20250718190608081-167224409.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
